verses.verse: And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> went out <WG1831> <WG5631>, and departed <WG4198> <WG5711> from <WG575> the temple <WG2411>: and <WG2532> his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101> came <WG4334> <WG5656> to him for to shew <WG1925> <WG5658> him <WG846> the buildings <WG3619> of the temple <WG2411>.
